text:
Ines Torelli (née Ines Stierli, June 14, 1931 – August 23, 2019) was a Swiss comedian, radio personality, singer and actress. She was born in St. Gallen, Canton of St. Gallen, Switzerland. She was known for her roles in the television series "Fascht e Familie" and in the 1961 movie "Chikita".
Torelli died on August 23, 2019 at her home in Rose Bay, Nova Scotia, Canada at the age of 88.
